subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Osi Umenyiora, who is unhappy with his contract, did not report, but the former standout wide receiver Plaxico Burress arrived in the evening for a meeting with Coach Tom Coughlin.
snippet: Osi Umenyiora, who is unhappy with his contract, did not report, but the former standout wide receiver Plaxico Burress arrived in the evening for a meeting with Coach Tom Coughlin.
